eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: 修改盲盒 boxIndex：盲盒索引 startTime：盲盒生效时间 endTime：盲盒失效时间.

functionDecorators.name: getPersonalBalanceWithFundingPayment
functionDecorators.description: get personal balance with funding payment.

returnDecorators.name: margin
returnDecorators.description: personal balance with funding payment in 18 digits.

functionDecorators.name: getPersonalPositionWithFundingPayment
functionDecorators.description: get personal position with funding payment.

parameterDecorators.name: _pnlCalcOption
parameterDecorators.description: ClearingHouse.PnlCalcOption, can be SPOT_PRICE or TWAP.

functionDecorators.name: isPositionNeedToBeMigrated
functionDecorators.description: verify if trader's position needs to be migrated.

returnDecorators.description: true if trader's position is not at the latest Amm curve, otherwise is false.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
